item.description:
Joint Event - The Newport Friends Meetup Group & The Newcomers to the Providence Area Meetup Group will attend:


Dinner at Brick Alley Pub & Newport Comedy Festival - Tracy Morgan [cast member of Saturday Night Live and 30 Rock]

Dinner at Brick Alley Pub - 5:00 PM, walk over to Comedy Festival between 7-7:30PM.
Please be on time so they will seat us at Brick Alley - they are strict with Summer Reservations.

If you can not make dinner - please contact me so that I can provide you with your ticket for entrance.


Tickets for Comedy Festival are $35 at the box office in Newport.
Dinner will be additional (based on what you order) at Brick Alley Pub.

Please provide payment by July 12th, so that we can order the tickets far enough in advance to sit together.

If you cannot make it after I've purchased tickets, it's your responsibility to find a replacement. I cannot give refunds after the tickets have been purchased.

Parking: The best/cheapest place to park would be Mary's lot for both Dinner & Comedy Show - the 1st left after Brick Alley Pub - Mary Street, then 1st right into Mary's lot.

For more information on the festival: http://www.newportcom...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be dining at Brick Alley Pub at 5:00 PM - for dinner - reservations under - Lonnie: 829-8516
item.name: Dinner at Brick Alley Pub & Newport Comedy Festival - Tracy Morgan
